transportAdvice: Riyadh has a modern metro system with several lines covering key districts, though many tourist attractions and neighborhoods are spread out and not easily walkable due to the city's car-centric layout and intense heat; taxis and ride-hailing services are widely available and are the most practical option for getting around.

weather.description: Cool and pleasant with mild days and cold nights, making it the most comfortable time to explore the city outdoors.
Warm days and cool evenings with occasional light rain, still very pleasant for sightseeing.
Temperatures rise noticeably and conditions remain dry and comfortable, though afternoons can feel warm.
Hot and dry with very little rainfall; outdoor activities are best done in the morning or evening.
Intense heat sets in with very dry conditions; midday outdoor exposure should be minimized.
Extremely hot and arid with little relief even at night; indoor attractions are strongly recommended during the day.
Peak summer heat with scorching temperatures throughout the day and warm nights; outdoor activity is not advisable.
Continues to be extremely hot and dry, similar to July; air-conditioned venues are essential for comfort.
Heat begins to ease slightly but remains very hot; conditions are still challenging for extended outdoor activity.
Noticeably more comfortable with warm days and cooler evenings, marking the return of pleasant travel conditions.
Mild and dry with comfortable temperatures throughout the day, ideal for outdoor exploration.
Cool and crisp with cold nights and pleasant daytime temperatures, one of the best months to visit.
